name: Great Escapes (itch)
description:
Great Escapes is a game for all room escape and adventure fans!

Built around the idea of quality over quantity, you won't find filler hidden object scenes or overly obtuse puzzles designed to get you paying for hints.

All the hints are free, so what would be the point!?!

Rather than 50 rooms and countless adverts, Great Escapes uses packs of well-designed and thought out rooms so that you can choose what sort of game you'd like to play today!

Great Escapes is always growing, we'll keep adding new packs in the future so make sure you stick around!

Key Features:

  • A first person point and click adventure game.
  • Trademark Glitch humour and puzzles that will leave you screaming at us.
  • The Glitch Camera to help you solve puzzles and keep track of clues.
  • Lots of clues to find and puzzles to solve.
  • Multiple packs with a variety of rooms to escape!
  • In game camera so you can take photos of all the clues and rooms you find.
  • Plenty of items to collect and fiendishly clever puzzles to solve!
  • Loads of items to find and use!
  • Clues to find and puzzles to solve!
  • A full hint guide that keeps track of your accomplishments to make sure you never get stuck.
  • Auto-save feature, never lose your progress again!

Download now to begin your great escapes!
